response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to both parties, as it is worth $800,000 to you. I am offering this remarkable asset to you at a special price of $750,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant saving of $50,000 compared to its full value. I trust you will find this offer compelling and look forward to discussing the details further.", "product_price": 750000}
